_metadata.description: Super Knowledge Base for NegotiationPro – psychology, tactics by phase, bias management, expanded personas, AI triggers with complex conditions

theories.title: Prospect Theory
theories.summary: People weigh losses more than equivalent gains.
recommended_actions: Frame offers as loss avoidance (what they might lose) rather than pure gain.

theories.title: Dual-Process Theory
theories.summary: System 1 (fast, intuitive) and System 2 (slow, analytical) shape decisions.
recommended_actions: If decisions stall, use stories/examples to engage System 1.
If decisions seem rushed, add objective criteria and pauses.

theories.title: Self-Determination
recommended_actions: Offer two controlled choices to preserve autonomy.

examples: Based on market medians and scope, I’m targeting {ANCHOR}.

opening.text: Invite alignment on a shared outcome.
examples: Before numbers, what would success look like for both sides?
What’s the biggest risk if we don’t solve X this quarter?

discovery.text: Hold a 3–5s pause after a weak offer.
examples: …(count to 4 silently)… then ask a precise follow-up.

bargaining.text: Trade low-priority issues for high-priority wins.
bargaining.why: Creates joint value when priorities differ.
examples: I can be flexible on start date if we align base with scope.

bargaining.text: Decompose the ‘one price’ into multiple value components.
examples: Let’s price scope A and scope B separately to match impact.
Could we align this week? A 5‑business‑day window works on my side.

closing.text: Offer a small final concession to enable signature.
examples: If we align base, I can include X onboarding session.

bias_management.name: Endowment Effect
mitigation: Speak as if the solution is already theirs (future pacing).
Show cost of losing the current path.

bias_management.name: Framing Effect
mitigation: Reframe to risk‑reduction and long‑term outcomes.
Contrast scenarios: with vs. without this agreement.

persona_expanded.name: The Dominator
best_openers: I appreciate your time — let’s go straight to the point.
Let’s align scope and decision window up front.
counter_tactics: Hold pace control with clear timeboxes.
Use crisp numbers and objective criteria.

persona_expanded.name: The Analyst
best_openers: I brought a concise benchmark summary; may I walk you through it?
Shall we agree success criteria before we price it?

persona_expanded.name: The Friend
best_openers: I’m glad we’re tackling this together — what would long-term success look like?
counter_tactics: Affirm rapport; gently return to scope/base.

persona_expanded.name: The Fox
best_openers: Let’s make sure we’re optimizing for the same outcomes.
I suggest we park perks until we align on scope/base.
counter_tactics: Name tactics neutrally; reset to criteria.
Ask clarifying questions; avoid rushed tradeoffs.

high_context: Allow longer pauses; avoid public confrontation.

ai_triggers.condition: counterpart_persona == 'The Friend' AND (culture == 'high' OR country in ['JP','KR','CN','AE','SA','QA','KW','IL'])
